Question
========
  
Which three actions lead to an increase in power? 
Answerlist
----------
* Increase the significance level, run a one-sided instead of a two-sided test, increase the standard deviation
* Increase the significance level, perform a one-sided instead of a two-sided test, increase the sample size
* Increase the significance level, perform a two-sided instead of a one-sided test, increase the expected effect
* Decrease the significance level, decrease the standard deviation, increase the sample


Solution
========
  
  
Answerlist
----------
* Increasing the standard deviation leads to lower power.
* This answer is correct.
* Performing a two-sided instead of a one-sided test leads to lower power.
* Lowering the significance level leads to lower power.
